Node.definition: = state in which humans happen to be in a certain place

possible literal meaning: without benefit or without success; hence: = state in which someone is considered an objectional human being who is engaged in evil behavior and does not contribute to the society in a positive way
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= man; ◄ son of Bichri (בִּכְרִי) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► rebelled against David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Sheba (שֶׁבַע) of the tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action by which humans blow air into a wind instrument and so produce a signal
= a musical instrument ◄ made from a ram's horn; ► sound is produced by blowing into the small end; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= relationship among humans or between humans and a certain location
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Obed (עֹובֵד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► father of David (דָּוִד)
= location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is committed to follow Y's leadership and example
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is committed to follow Y's leadership and example
= man; ◄ son of Bichri (בִּכְרִי) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► rebelled against David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Sheba (שֶׁבַע) of the tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= action by which someone commits oneself to remain closely involved with another person or group, out of affection and/or solidarity
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= river; ◄ flowing from Mount Hermon (חֶרְמֹון) in a southerly direction through the Sea of Galilee (כִּנֶּרֶת) into the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= a woman who lives with a man but has lower status than his wife or wives
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
literally: to cause to contain; hence: = causative action by which humans, animals or deities ensure that (other) humans received the food and care that they need
= state in which conditions are confined to one single place as a result of being completely surrounded by some kind of force, ≈ as if they were physically bound or wrapped up
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= state in which women have lost their husband, ► which requires them to wear widow's clothing; ≈ associated with disgrace
= state in which someone is alive and well

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man; ◄ son of Jether (יֶתֶר) and Abigail (אֲבִיגַיִל) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► army commander

Node.gloss: to call together|to gather|to muster|to assemble
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans are called together as a group ► for a certain activity, usually for battle

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= state in which a countable entity is three in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= man; ◄ son of Jether (יֶתֶר) and Abigail (אֲבִיגַיִל) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► army commander

Node.gloss: to call together|to gather|to muster|to assemble
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans are called together as a group ► for a certain activity, usually for battle

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

Node.gloss: to delay|to linger|to stay|to be slow
Node.definition: = to do something later than expected
= a fixed point in time for a particular event
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to set; hence: = action by which humans make a certain decision regarding something

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man, also known as Abshai (אַבְשַׁי) ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► warrior
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

Node.gloss: to do harm (to someone)|to make suffer|to deal, treat harshly|to afflict
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities bring suffering or disaster upon a humans, often as the result of wrong behavior
= man; ◄ son of Bichri (בִּכְרִי) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► rebelled against David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Sheba (שֶׁבַע) of the tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) ► attempted to become king in his father's place but was killed in the attempt
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= state in which an area has been made inaccessible and strong, beyond the reach of others, such as enemies, ◄ usually by surrounding it by a high wall
literally: to be delivered from (someone's) eyes

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
literally: Cherethite and Pelethite; hence: = David (דָּוִד) royal guard, which probably consisted of foreign (possibly Philistine) mercenaries
literally: Cherethite and Pelethite; hence: = David (דָּוִד) royal guard, which probably consisted of foreign (possibly Philistine) mercenaries
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= man; ◄ son of Bichri (בִּכְרִי) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► rebelled against David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Sheba (שֶׁבַע) of the tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)

= an object ◄ of stone, ► usually found in nature and used for throwing, building crude constructions; stones with a particular shape are sometimes used as a memorial or religious symbol; ≈ regarded as extremely common, easily available, but also as strong, hard, and unflexible
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= town; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► one of the four Hivite (חִוִּי) cities that made a covenant with Joshua (יְהֹושׁוּעַ)
= man; ◄ son of Jether (יֶתֶר) and Abigail (אֲבִיגַיִל) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► army commander
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army

Node.gloss: to be girded with|to wear (clothes, armor)
Node.definition: = state in which someone wears clothes or armor
= a generic word for clothing, which in certain contexts may denote a specific kind of clothes, such as someone's tunic or armor
= generic designation for any article of clothing

= long, thin strip of material, worn around the waist; ◄ made out of leather or cloth; ► used either to cover one's nudity or to keep one's other clothes together; ≈ sometimes associated with honor and respect
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= state in which humans have something attached to their body

= the two sides of the body of humans and certain animals between the rib cage and the hips, ► which is the place where people normally tie a girdle, breeches, loincloth, or sackcloth; ≈ a symbol of strength

= case or bag about the size and shape of a sword, attached to a circular strap or belt that could be hung over the shoulder or tied around the waist, or to a combination of a belt and a shoulder strap; ► used to cover and to carry the sword
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
= man; ◄ son of Jether (יֶתֶר) and Abigail (אֲבִיגַיִל) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► army commander
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
only used in vocatives: = friendly and endearing way to address a man

Node.gloss: to grasp|to take hold of (something)|to seize|to catch|to hold on (to something)
Node.definition: = to take hold of someone or something; humans typically do this with their hands and animals use their mouths; however, it is often extended to include inanimate objects (traps), personalized qualities (wisdom), emotions (anger, fear), or processes (time)

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
= a growth of hair on the chin and lower cheeks of a mature man’s face, ≈ the absence of which is regarded as shameful
= man; ◄ son of Jether (יֶתֶר) and Abigail (אֲבִיגַיִל) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► army commander

= action with which a person touches her or his lips to another person (usually on the lips or cheek or hand) or to an object ► to show love or respect or devotion; also used when greeting and saying goodbye
= man; ◄ son of Jether (יֶתֶר) and Abigail (אֲבִיגַיִל) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► army commander
= action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
= area located below diaphragm, containing stomach and bowels and other contents
= causative action by which humans pour out a liquid or dry substance

literally = the bowels or inner parts of a human body; sometimes used collectively to refer to all the internal organs and even the whole being, and sometimes used to refer to a specific part of the human body, for example, the stomach, the heart, the womb, the soul, the breast, the genitals; ≈ associated with emotions such as anguish but also compassion

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
= man, also known as Abshai (אַבְשַׁי) ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► warrior
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= man; ◄ son of Bichri (בִּכְרִי) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► rebelled against David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Sheba (שֶׁבַע) of the tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= state in which humans and deities are emotionally attached to (other) humans
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is committed to follow Y's leadership and example
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
= man; ◄ son of Jether (יֶתֶר) and Abigail (אֲבִיגַיִל) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► army commander
= action by which humans turn about in a liquid or substance, so that their clothing becomes drenched by it

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land
= a relatively wide road or access ramp made by by covering the surface of the ground with thicks layers of sand

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
literally: to cause to go around; hence: = causative action by which humans cause an object to be removed from its place and brought somewhere else

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ son of Jether (יֶתֶר) and Abigail (אֲבִיגַיִל) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► army commander
= a relatively wide road or access ramp made by by covering the surface of the ground with thicks layers of sand

= a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.
= generic designation for any article of clothing
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= causative action by which humans remove other humans from a certain space
= a relatively wide road or access ramp made by by covering the surface of the ground with thicks layers of sand
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= man; ◄ son of Bichri (בִּכְרִי) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► rebelled against David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Sheba (שֶׁבַע) of the tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= town; short name for Abel Beth Maacah (אָבֵל בֵּית מַעֲכָה) also known as Abel Maim (אָבֵל מָיִם) ◄ territory of Naphtali (נַפְתָּלִי)

m.definition: = town, also known as Abel Maim (אָבֵל מָיִם) and Abel (אָבֵל) ◄ territory of Naphtali (נַפְתָּלִי)

Node.definition: = meaning unsure, possibly to be read as בכרים: = clan of which Sheba (שֶׁבַע) the son of Bichri (בִּכְרִי) was a member

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y

= action by which a group of humans gather around a town with an army and surround it ► with the purpose of forcing it to surrender by cutting off all supplies, or by attacking it directly with the help of siege works

m.definition: = town; short name for Abel Beth Maacah (אָבֵל בֵּית מַעֲכָה) also known as Abel Maim (אָבֵל מָיִם) ◄ territory of Naphtali (נַפְתָּלִי)
= town, also known as Abel Maim (אָבֵל מָיִם) and Abel (אָבֵל) ◄ territory of Naphtali (נַפְתָּלִי)

Node.definition: = causative action by which humans pour out a liquid or dry substance
= earthen mound, cast up against the wall of a city ► in order to enable to enemy to scale the wall

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

meaning unsure; probably: = a structure surrounding a town, outside the main wall; ◄ made out of of stones or bricks; ► provides strength and security to the town; ≈ sometimes used metaphorically to denote someone who offers protection
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
literally: to cause to fall; hence: = causative process by which humans cause a structure to lose its inner strength and fall apart

= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army

Node.gloss: to approach|to come near|to come forward
Node.definition: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to approach|to come near|to come forward
Node.definition: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus

= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army

= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= woman who is the legal property of someone else; either married or eligible for marriage; her children belong to the person who owns her; ≈ because of this an אָמָה appears to have a somewhat higher status than a שִׁפְחָה even though both terms are sometimes used interchangeably

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= town; short name for Abel Beth Maacah (אָבֵל בֵּית מַעֲכָה) also known as Abel Maim (אָבֵל מָיִם) ◄ territory of Naphtali (נַפְתָּלִי)
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= person who is considered worthy of trust, because s/he is truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in his/her actions

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= causative action by which animals, humans, or deities do whatever is necessary to perform a particular event

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= state in which a town is committed to fulfilling its obligations to the nation of which it is a part; ◄ here compared to a mother, who is considered a loyal and responsible part of a family

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= causative action by which deities or humans cause other humans and objects to be removed from existence in a violent way, as if by swallowing up, either by direct intervention or by accomplishing this through the hands of others
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= exclamation expressing a strong conclusion, rejecting the event to which it refers to as inappropriate behavior
= exclamation expressing a strong conclusion, rejecting the event to which it refers to as inappropriate behavior
= particle marking an oath or a similar strongly worded statement

= causative action by which deities or humans cause other humans and objects to be removed from existence in a violent way, as if by swallowing up, either by direct intervention or by accomplishing this through the hands of others
= particle marking an oath or a similar strongly worded statement
= an area dominated by elevations of the earth's surface
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man; ◄ son of Bichri (בִּכְרִי) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► rebelled against David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Sheba (שֶׁבַע) of the tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
literally: to lift up (one's) hand; hence = action by which humans initiate a physical conflict with other humans

Node.gloss: to lift up (one's) hand (against someone else)
Node.definition: literally: to lift up (one's) hands (against someone); hence: = action by which humans engage in an act of violence against other humans
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state of being integrated but physically detached from other, similar objects or events
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= relation denoting that someone performs a certain event via the path of something else

= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= man; ◄ son of Bichri (בִּכְרִי) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► rebelled against David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Sheba (שֶׁבַע) of the tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
= action by which humans blow air into a wind instrument and so produce a signal
= a musical instrument ◄ made from a ram's horn; ► sound is produced by blowing into the small end; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= man, also known as Benaiahu (בְּנָיָהוּ) ◄ son of Jehoiada (יְהֹויָדָע) ► warrior and army commander under kings David (דָּוִד) and Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Benaiah (בְּנָיָהוּ) warrior, later army commander of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה)
literally: Cherethite and Pelethite; hence: = David (דָּוִד) royal guard, which probably consisted of foreign (possibly Philistine) mercenaries

= man, also called Adoniram (אֲדֹנִירָם) and Hadoram (הֲדֹורָם) ◄ son of Abda (עַבְדָּא) ► official; time of kings David (דָּוִד) Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and Rehoboam (רְחַבְעָם) stoned by people when they rebelled against Rehoboam
= a class of people who are enlisted compulsorily to do work for others
= man; ◄ son of Ahilud (אֲחִילוּד) ► recorder; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man, ► father of Jehoshapat (יְהֹושָׁפָט) recorder; time of David (דָּוִד)

= person who has been appointed to bring matters of importance to the attention of the king and give advice|exact meaning unsure; possibly: = a dignitary at the royal court in charge of state records and documents
= man; ► secretary; time of David (דָּוִד)

= a high ranking official, usually learned, who served in the king's court and was responsible for the king's official business ► held some authority in administrative and financial, and perhaps also military matters

= man; ◄ son of Ahitub (אֲחִיטוּב) descendent of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► father of Ahimaaz (אֲחִימַעַץ) became high priest (כֹּהֵן) under David (דָּוִד) and Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) with the prophet (נָבִיא) Nathan (נָתָן) anointed Solomon as David (דָּוִד)'s successor; officer in charge of his tribe
= man; ◄ son of Ahimelech (אֲחִימֶלֶךְ) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) time of king David (דָּוִד)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= man; ◄ from Jair (יָאִיר) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) for David (דָּוִד)
exact meaning unsure: = member of clan of Jair (יָאִיר) or inhabitant of town of Jair (יָאִיר)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
